tweets.text: 1/5 Let's talk about DevOps best practices that often get overlooked. First up: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) testing...
2/5 Your IaC should be tested just like application code. Use tools like Terratest, kitchen-terraform, or AWS CDK assertions.
@sample_author What about cost estimation in IaC testing? Any recommendations?
@curious_dev Great question! Tools like Infracost and Terraform Cost Estimation can help. Always include cost boundaries in your tests.
